sources.title: Cape Fear (1962) ( Colorized) Gregory Peck Â· Robert Mitchum
sources.description: After his release from prison, a sex offender seeks revenge on the lawyer whose testimony once landed him behind bars. The lawyer ultimately defends himself against the threat to his family with a trick. A sensational, suspenseful film that skillfully plays on the viewer's emotions.

metadata.Plot: Small-town lawyer Sam Bowden's life becomes torturous when Max Cady re-enters his life. Cady went to jail for 8 years after Bowden testified that Cady attacked a young woman. Now that Cady has been released, he begins to terrorize Bowden and his family, particularly targeting Bowden's daughter, Nancy. Initially, Cady uses his newfound knowledge of the law (learned in prison) to annoy the Bowdens, then poisons the family dog... Who's next ?
metadata.Writer: John D. MacDonald, James R. Webb
metadata.Actors: Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum, Polly Bergen
